Name: Let It Go - How to realize your dreams
About the game: Let It Go is a fast-paced puzzle game that will reveal philozofic' secrets of the Great Meow-Meow. Play as a tormented soul on a deserted island, and solve the puzzles to find out what is preventing you from living your dream. But beware, the Great Meow-Meow offers you only 21 seconds on his island! Fortunately there are ways to increase your game time... What is the secret to go live your dreams? A playful experience of personal development, with a real treasure revealed, at least to those who will be able to pass the tests? Time belongs to you An extraordinary power that will allow you to play with the events of the island. Make offerings to the Great Meow-Meow There are bottles of heavenly milk hidden on the island... find them, and the Great Meow-Meow will reward you with more time to explore his island and solve the riddles. A short life span Your time is precious, that's why Let It Go is a short and deep experience (1-2 hour of play on average for a first game.) We want a majority of players to be able to finish Let It Go and get the secret to go live their dreams. Speedrun mode Let It Go is a game where you will learn how the island works by heart. After completing the game, you will unlock a speedrun mode with a brand new soundtrack, with no possibility to return to the Great Meow-Meow's Hub. Live a philosophical experience approved by the Great Meow-Meow, he knows what is good glory to him !
